description: 1 + number of partitions of n, n>0.
comments: For n>0: number of occurrences of n in partitions of 2*n: a(n)=A066633(2*n,n), cf. A058696. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 22 2004
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 772
maple: spec := [S,{B=Set(C),C=Sequence(Z,1 <= card),S=Union(C,B)},unlabeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20);with(combinat): A052810 := numbpart+1; [ seq(numbpart(i)+1,i=1..50) ];
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: Better description and more terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 06 2001
